alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 8:59PM CDT until May 19 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Texas... Guadalupe River at Victoria affecting Victoria County. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River at Victoria. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, aater crosses Fordyce Road at the large culvert between the lakes. The main portion of Saxet Lake Park is closed and water covers some of the picnic areas and roads. Gates located at the intersection of Fordyce Road and Fox road, as well as the intersection of Fordyce Road and Timber Drive are closed and no traffic is allowed through. Water is under the U. S. Business 59 East and West relief bridges, and over Craig and Constitution. Areas west of Moody Street between Water and Constitution are threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Monday, the stage was 28.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest near 29.1 feet Tuesday evening, then begin a slow fall, dropping below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (10 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Guadalupe River Victoria 21.0 28.7 Mon 8 pm 29.1 27.4 20.5 13.1 9.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
